name: Flippers Descent
description:
Descend into the depths of a pixelated ocean in an attempt to save Flippers friend from the clutches of a giant octopus!

8 unique powerups to enhance Flippers abilities, including a shell shield, swordfish sword, a teleporter and many more!

Uncover many hidden secrets and easter eggs.

Created by sojourn

Music by www.Mcgmusic.net

Originally made too be played on mobile

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.descent.flippers&hl=en&gl=US
